channel.title: NPC disappearing
channel.description:
I was just making a mini-mini-mini-game and got it almost working, there is still a thing I wanna fix, that if you die or escape the scene(easiest done by a boolean telling if they are in the specified spot, which I got) the boss npc will disappear and that's how it manages to get always a full heal after someone forfeiting!
EDIT: lolz this was too easy... sorry... Got it solved

item.title: NPC disappearing
item.dc:creator: @laveerre laveerre
